column1: There were people of all political parties religions races and ethnic groups to stand up against divisive rhetoric to watch for misuse of social media by those here at home and foreign adversaries and fight to fund education and law enforcement.

What a beautiful show of unity today at the Nassau County March Against Anti-Semitism organized by @NassauExecutive Laura Curran and Suffolk County Executive @SteveBellone ! It was an honor to speak and it was so uplifting to see so many people show up to Stop the Hate! https://t.co/kf56jlGVD2

Today I met with representatives from @TCCNewYork the largest Turkish American grassroots organization in the country. We discussed the ongoing human rights abuses by the Erdogan regime and its impact on Turkish Americans in our communities. https://t.co/gUOjaS2VFt

Happy 101st Birthday to my predecessor former Congressman @RepWolff the oldest living member of Congress!  On behalf of the institution he served and all his colleagues past and present I wish Lester a happy 101st year and many more! https://t.co/Zl3cCTi5eJ
Please see my statement below regarding the situation in Iraq. https://t.co/Myd2GK8UJZ https://t.co/u9bkzwFQxm

Today along w/my colleagues @RepPeteKing @RepKathleenRice @RepGregoryMeeks I sent a letter to our national security officials urging them to investigate foreign adversaries as to their continual use of social media & other efforts to foment hate & civil unrest across America. https://t.co/Z4HV8Ep8wo
Hateful attacks against one community are attacks on us all. We must stand together in solidarity against anti-Semitism and all forms of hate!
My statement on the horrific attack against the Jewish community in Rockland County NY last night.  We must all stand up to this type of hate and anti-Semitism. https://t.co/oCcfHgR56Z
The 2017 cap on SALT broke a century-old agreement. A covenant to protect state and local government and my bill restores that protection it restores that covenant and it restores fairness as well.
Amid all the turmoil in DC I am thrilled that the House has passed my legislation to restore tax fairness for my constituents on Long Island.
BIG VICTORY!!!  Passed with bipartisan support by a vote of 218 - 206 including Republic yes votes! https://t.co/GEjsL7zTR2

I am fired up about restoring tax fairness to my constituents!  Watch as I speak on the House Floor about my bipartisan bill to restore the State and Local Tax Deduction.  The full House will vote later today...keep watching for updates! https://t.co/31PL8pgQPt
Now we need the Senate to act.  I spoke on the floor of the House in support of this bill.  https://t.co/WB9KEY81Ec

Today I voted for and the House passed the Elijah E. Cummings Lower Drug Costs Now Act. This legislation that I cosponsored and helped write will allow Medicare to negotiate prescription drug prices something that President Trump also agreed with until he backtracked.
While battles continue in DC people want and need lower prescription drug prices. https://t.co/WB9KEY81Ec

Please listen to one of my follow-up statements during yesterday's House Ways and Means Committee hearing where I laid out exactly how unfair this punch in the gut has been to my district. https://t.co/0wfIGySb5e

I was fired up! Watch! Amidst all the turmoil in DC I have remained focused on leading the battle to repeal the SALT cap.  Repealing SALT is all about tax fairness to New York and my constituents. https://t.co/0wfIGySb5e

Earlier today the House Ways & Means Committee took up my bipartisan legislation that will restore tax fairness to my constituents. The bill passed through committee by a vote of 24 - 17 (including a Republican yes vote) and now moves on to the full House.
Amidst all the turmoil in DC I have remained focused on leading the battle to repeal the SALT cap. https://t.co/zwXBGiJG34

Today in spite of all the turmoil in Washington DC my bipartisan bill to repeal the SALT cap and restore tax fairness to my constituents passed through the House Ways & Means Committee by a vote of 24 - 17 (with Republican yes vote) and now moves on to the full House.
PASSED!! https://t.co/XTznvBqcir

Today the House Ways and Means Committee is meeting to mark up my bipartisan legislation to repeal the SALT cap. This should easily pass out of Committee today and hopefully move on to the House floor for a vote next week.  Stay tuned for updates.
In the midst of the Washington battles I am leading the battle to restore tax fairness to my constituents! https://t.co/AxWC6Zphjg
Please read more from today's NEWSDAY and look for updates tomorrow. https://t.co/aCNnb6zpR4

The cap on SALT deductions has been unfair to New Yorkers with Long Islanders being particularly hard-hit. Tomorrow the House Ways and Means Committee will take up my fight to repeal the cap on SALT deductions.

In the midst of all the battles in DC I know the people I represent want their State and Local Tax (SALT) deduction restored! We want tax fairness! I am leading the Ways and Means bill for Congress to restore the SALT deduction.
I will continue to fight hate from my hometown to Washington DC. https://t.co/YN3VfcRDn4

We must educate Americans about the Holocaust & how it happened. That is why I strongly support the #NeveAgainEducationAct leg. that will give teachers the resources & training necessary to teach children about the Holocaust & the horrific consequences of hate & intolerance.

The anti-Semitic graffiti sprayed on the entrance of the @HolocaustTolCtr in my hometown of Glen Cove is disturbing. White nationalism & anti-Semitism are real & growing threats in America. I will continue to stand up & speak out against incidents like this but we must do more.
Thank you @TedSmyth https://t.co/4HGV2yuHtW
Thank you @DanMulhall https://t.co/Hm9yL9VLCg

The uncertainty of Brexit cannot undermine the peace process. Any future U.S.-U.K. trade agreement must require that the conditions of the Good Friday Agreement be met.  Please listen to my floor speech. https://t.co/EGUu1hFIjU
Unanimous Bipartisan Support of my Resolution to Protect the Good Friday Agreement and Peace in Ireland.
If you are not a person of goodwill you need to go! Stephen Miller and people who share his views have no place in our government. https://t.co/t8bt9kIx6G

It’s no wonder that this Administration’s immigration policies seem so mean-spirited and wrong-headed!  I will fight discrimination and hate from my hometown to Washington D.C.! We can solve our problems if people of goodwill work together

White nationalism racism and anti-Semitism are a real and growing threat in America. I have and always will fight against hate and intolerance in my hometown and across our country. https://t.co/9AN36yAh4M
Big win for the pro-Democracy movement in Hong Kong! https://t.co/mDIxo07COJ
The time to act is now. No more violence and repression!
The president must now sign this veto proof legislation and China must take notice that Hong Kong will lose its special status if it cannot demonstrate that it is autonomous from Beijing.

Beijing’s efforts to thwart democracy in Hong Kong will result in serious consequences now that the Senate has passed Hong Kong Human Rights and Democracy Act which has already passed the House. https://t.co/TKHfv5JoK1
the battle including those who made the ultimate sacrifice.  Please reach out to Betsy Davidson at (631) 923-4100 or betsy.davidson@mail.house.gov

I would like to mark this milestone by not only paying tribute to those lost but by listening to the stories of the remaining survivors of the Battle of the Bulge. I am asking residents of the 3rd Congressional District to share any information you have regarding survivors from

suffered nearly 89500 casualties including 19000 killed.  75 years later our nation is still humbled by the courage and fortitude of the American soldiers as they were tested by great adversity. We continue to owe these heroes a debt that can never be paid.

I am looking for witnesses to history!  Next month I will be traveling to Belgium to commemorate the 75th anniversary of the Battle of the Bulge.  Officially known as the Ardennes Counteroffensive the battle proved to be one of the costliest ever fought by the U.S. Army which

line against increasingly totalitarian advances by Beijing.   Last month the House unanimously passed the Hong Kong Human Rights and Democracy Act of 2019. It is now time for the Senate to pass this important legislation and for the President to sign it into law.

Earlier this year Speaker Pelosi appointed me to the Congressional-Executive Commission on China which seeks to hold the Chinese government accountable for human rights abuses. I will continue using my position to support Hong Kong’s pro-democracy champions as they hold the

The eyes of the world continue to focus on Hong Kong!  The Chinese and Hong Kong governments must stop the use of excessive force and allow students at Polytechnic University to leave without fear of violence and bloodshed.  https://t.co/AzAxPgAHfk

•Allow Medicare to negotiate directly w/pharmaceutical companies •Ensure that all Americans whether they have government or private insurance will experience lower prescription drug prices and •Limit out-of-pocket costs for people on Medicare to no more than $2000 per year

We need to keep the pressure on US pharmaceutical companies that spend more money on marketing than research and development.   In the House we introduced HR 3 the Lower Drug Costs Now Act of 2019 which will lower the cost of prescription drugs in the US. The legislation will:

Nearly 100 years later Banting and his colleagues must be rolling in their graves as their life-saving medication is now the poster child for pharmaceutical price gouging. Stories of diabetics rationing insulin - and dying for it - are not uncommon. This is reprehensible.

Banting & his co-inventors refused to have their names on the patent they sold to the Univ of Toronto for a mere $1. They felt it was unethical for a doctor to profit from a discovery that would save lives & they wanted everyone who needed their medication to be able to afford it
Today is #WorldDiabetesDay designated so as it is also the birthday of Sir Frederick Banting one of the doctors who discovered insulin in 1921. https://t.co/Yymu7QSWK0

Mrs. O'Hare has been a tireless lifelong advocate for maintaining peace justice and reconciliation throughout Ireland. She played a major role advocating for the Good Friday Agreement and now upholding it during the Brexit drama.
This evening I joined my fellow members of the Friends of Ireland Caucus including W&M Chairman Congressman Richard Neal at a farewell reception for Sinn Fein’s Rita O’Hare. https://t.co/AgasEQUhAq
While this Administration continues to push a short-sighted agenda of environmental deregulation I will continue to fight back for our children and our children's children.

Climate change is real and one of the greatest challenges of our time. Putting any limits on scientific and medical research that would inform government policy making will completely hamstring the EPA.  https://t.co/8rDH0WphSY

Thinking big pays off! About a yr ago I started promoting the concept of building a rocket on Long Island. I introduced @launcher CEO & founder Max Haot to USAF leaders at a conf I spoke at in NYC. Now Launcher has recvd a $1.5 million award/contract at the USAF Space Pitch Day. https://t.co/VrOdvpCKTF
Thank you @SLICKARELLI for calling my attention to this and thank you Suffolk County Executive @SteveBellone for getting it done! https://t.co/bTs8yUXFRX

The resolution seeks to maintain peace in Ireland by ensuring that Brexit & other political challenges do not reintroduce a hard border betwn the Rep. of Ireland & Northern Ireland. Thanks to my colleague Peter King & 40 other bipartisan members for cosponsoring the resolution.

This is a crucial point while the UK approaches a Brexit deal. The US must make our position clear. We will not enter a new trade deal with the UK unless it adheres to the Good Friday agreement. https://t.co/Sp7PIv7nrj

We must protect the Good Friday Agreement! My bipartisan House Resolution calling for strict adherence to the Good Friday Agreement during Brexit negotiations passed w/unanimous bipartisan support through @HouseForeign  & now advances to the full House for a vote.

and the sheer bravery of the men and women in our military and our intelligence communities working in close coordination with our allies in the region who are as committed to eradicating terrorism as the United States.
Big win for America and the world!  We got the mastermind and leader of ISIS.  This success was achieved through the leadership of the United States our armed forces
To all my friends in the Indian American community and others who are celebrating I wish you all a very happy and blessed Diwali! Naya Saal Mubarak! https://t.co/lkUHAPjip7
@CongressionalAC @TeenHacksLI

‼️Just a reminder that the last day to submit your app for the Congressional App Challenge is coming up...Nov 1st! @CongressionalAC  is open to all middle & high school students in #NY03  Rules registration & more → https://t.co/hzIGszQkeO  I can’t wait to see your ideas! https://t.co/VNEONMkrNz

@repjohnlewis and I stand with the people of Hong Kong!   We recorded a video to advocate and show our support for non-violent protesters in Hong Kong.   For the full story behind the video Here is part 1: https://t.co/1PANpXBnq0  Here is part 2: https://t.co/KJuUZPsYPl https://t.co/4Rxu9z5FiP

Today the House Ways and Means Committee will begin marking up H.R. 3 the Lower Drug Costs Now Act of 2019. Under H.R. 3 American families will save $158 billion in lower premiums and out-of-pocket costs. That’s $1920 for every American family of four.

U.S. Drug Prices are Too High!  On average U.S. consumers pay four times more for the same drugs than consumers in other countries pay. In some cases U.S. consumers are paying 67 times more for the very same product! This is unacceptable. https://t.co/miaD0XoljE

Please listen to my Congressional-Executive Commission on China hearing where I discuss how the products of forced labor in Xinjiang are reaching American consumers. It is appalling. https://t.co/b2cdzyaFlW

The Chinese government has a plan to dominate the world economically technologically and militarily.  Most Americans do not realize that Chinese human rights abuses against its own people are horrific.
Rep. Brian Fitzpatrick and I put together a bipartisan video in support of the Never Again Education Act.  Please stand with us and sign the Never Again Petition. https://t.co/f6VlOddHQv
The Holocaust is Real! Support the #NeverAgainEducationAct   Something we can all agree on - hate should never go unchallenged and discrimination can not be tolerated. https://t.co/K9N07qEul9
As a first-generation Italian-American I have a soft spot for Italy but did you know that Italy is the 8th largest economy in the world and one of our most reliable NATO partners.

Benvenuto Presidente Mattarella!  It was a great honor to meet Italian President Sergio Mattarella and welcome him to Capitol Hill. Italy is one of our most valued allies and continues to work with the United States to foster peace and prosperity around the world. https://t.co/gX8UC9vXOg

Please join me in offering a prayer for #ElijahCummings and his family. He was a great American and public servant. He will truly be missed by his colleagues his constituents and of course his family and those who loved him.

Today his legacy and dedication to the #NYPD endure thanks to the work of @petrosinousa in America in New York Padula and Sicily.  Thanks to all of the men and women in blue who put their lives on the line every day to keep us safe. @NYPDnews

See my speech on the House floor in honor of the life & legacy of Lt Det Giuseppe “Joe” Petrosino who was assassinated in Sicily 110 years ago while investigating org. crime. Lt Det Petrosino was the 1st NYPD officer killed overseas in the line of duty. https://t.co/bzKSCrf0Fn

This morning I spoke before the House Transportation and Infrastructure Committee on behalf of my bipartisan bill H.R. 3262 Sami's Law. This common-sense bipartisan legislation would provide consumers with a level of safety BEFORE entering a vehicle. https://t.co/II280ZVuxX

UBER and Lyft have safety issues that must be addressed!  Earlier this year Sami Josephson a 21-year old college student called for an Uber entered the wrong car and was murdered. https://t.co/0ps228Gdc1
Congratulations and thank you to @antigonerising on your great and good work! The futures of the young women in our community are brighter and more promising thanks to you. https://t.co/4vLIfSoY6X

Attended the Ribbon Cutting for the grand opening of @TheGirlsRising Girls Rising HQ in Sea Cliff!  Workshops grants and scholarships to inspire and empower young women in Science Technology Engineering ARTS and Mathematics. https://t.co/fzd2Ttk58S

Democracy works when the public is engaged. Today I met w/a large group of engaged constituents at @suffolkyjcc Discussed were issues of particular concern to this community incl the rise in anti-Semitism national security upcoming elections prescription drug prices & Medicare https://t.co/5gXsITAY3E
It was a pleasure to meet with Nikita and her parents who are committed to raising awareness of the high risks of heart disease within the South Asian community. https://t.co/uOZhicv6Rp
The South Asian community has 4x the risk of heart disease and a much greater chance of suffering a heart attack before the age of 50 than the general population.

Today I met with Nikita Sharma a student from Syosset High School who has been advocating on behalf of H.R.3131 - South Asian Heart Health Awareness and Research Act of 2019 of which I am a cosponsor.
L'Shanah Tovah!  Happy New Year to all celebrating the start of the High Holy Days this evening. https://t.co/cUnee1zsf7
Please read my statement below regarding today's bipartisan vote in the House to terminate the President's national emergency declaration. https://t.co/2BnaQJaFnl https://t.co/HvomYJfpVW

At yesterday's Ways and Means subcommittee hearing on the public health consequences and costs of gun violence I advocated for CDC funding to research the causes and effects of the gun violence “epidemic." Listen to my full testimony below: https://t.co/pM686lpNrU
Gun violence kills over 100 Americans a day if any single virus or bacteria was killing over 100 Americans a day the CDC would be on red alert!
I recently presented the resolution to leaders from several Irish-American organizations including @mrtyg1 https://t.co/Kd37GtiCAr

As a member of the House Ways and Means Committee which has jurisdiction over any trade agreements between the United States and the United Kingdom I will fight to ensure a soft border and implementation of the Good Friday Agreement requirements for any negotiation.

Today I intro'd a bipartisan H Res in support of the Good Friday Accords to maintain peace in Ireland. We need to ensure that Brexit & other political challenges don’t threaten the peace process by reintroducing a hard border between the Republic of Ireland and Northern Island. https://t.co/eBgUvpkifz
I believe that it is my Constitutional duty and the duty of the United States Congress to move forward with impeachment inquiries. Please read my complete statement below: https://t.co/CoH3TYkZxg
https://t.co/m1oWyM34UV
Thank you @CongressmanRaja & we look forward to working with you to address this issue. #EndYouthVaping https://t.co/pi2R693pJf
Thank you @CongressmanRaja for your leadership on this issue! https://t.co/hubXfkizKp

@HKNC_news headquartered in Sands Point serves a population that is both deaf and blind truly representing miracles in people's lives. This afternoon I spoke on the floor before the House unanimously passed the HKNC Reauthorization Act. https://t.co/b317L4MSZj
Earlier this week I spoke on the House floor regarding Immigration. Please watch below.  https://t.co/cT75yV3sPG

Eighteen years ago our country changed forever. Let us never forget the pain that was visited upon us. Let us never forget the bravery and sacrifice of our first responders. And most importantly let us rededicate ourselves to the dream and promise that is America.

Never forget. This morning I joined fellow members of Congress in a moment of silence on the steps of the U.S. Capitol in remembrance of September 11 2001. Afterward we sang “God Bless America.” https://t.co/BZjNtX6coW
The Senate needs to act now! https://t.co/FlkXKGjEmE

17 states & DC have passed some form of red-flag laws. NYS's red flag law went into effect last month. This important legislation which was championed by Linda Beigel-Schulman whose son Scott was killed in the Parkland shooting takes 1 important step forward in saving lives.

Today the House Judiciary began voting on a series of gun violence prevention bills. One of which “red flag” legislation would take away firearms from people who are deemed by courts to be a threat to themselves or others.

High school students interested in applying to a military academy can learn more about the application and nominating process by clicking on the link below or by contacting Ashley Alfredsen Veterans Caseworker at the Huntington Office (631) 923-4100. https://t.co/PHUIdNcqNC

Nominating men & women to one of our nation's service academies is one of the highest honors I have as your Member of Congress. The deadline for submitting a nomination application packet to the Huntington District Office is November 1 2019.

Do you have an interesting app idea? You can now turn your idea into reality. The 2019 Congressional App Challenge is open to all middle & high school students in #NY03  Rules registration and more → https://t.co/hzIGszQkeO  I can’t wait to see your ideas! https://t.co/Sf3pGfLG7J

@RepPeteKing & I have proposed bipartisan legislation that would facilitate (by adding a checkoff on your fed income tax forms) making a voluntary tax-deductible contribution to fund Alzheimer's research & caregiver support svcs. A sensible effort indeed! https://t.co/2kdF23ICkC

This news is troubling for our community. Honest local news reporting is essential to our democracy. #Fios1News #LocalJournalismMatters  Verizon to shut down FiOS1 News channel  https://t.co/KcGBTfpjcv via @Newsday

It is only through seeing and experiencing Israel firsthand that one can truly learn appreciate and understand the history the strategic importance it plays in the region for security prosperity and its democratic values.

While I disagree with Representatives Omar and Tlaib over their position on Israel the anti-Semitic language they have used in the past and their support of the BDS movement I believe it was wrong for Israel to deny duly elected Members of Congress the opportunity to visit.

100000 Americans are waiting for a kidney transplant right now but only about 19000 will receive one this year a third of which will come from living donors. Be a hero. Save a life. https://t.co/VHBQOCLIYV

Chief Mike Strong (pictured next to me) of the Nassau County Fire Service Academy is waiting for a kidney transplant. His blood type is O+.  Pete and Mike are good men who serve our community selflessly. God bless them both!

Living kidney donors save lives! This past March Pete Prudente (2nd from left) a member of the Glen Cove Volunteer Fire Dept donated a kidney to a complete stranger saying “I would do it again and I wish I had five of them.” Pete looks great & says he feels great too.

Last night I attended National Night Out in Glen Cove. It’s all about people getting to know the police and police getting to know the people. That’s the heart of “community policing.”  Glen Cove has one of the lowest crime rates in all of Nassau County! https://t.co/9UWRJXojxE

Through this year’s House appropriations process I helped secure additional funding for the National Institutes of Health budget thereby helping some of our premier local institutions such as @CSHL and the Feinstein Institute for Medical Research fight this insidious killer.
Today is World Lung Cancer Day. Lung cancer is the leading cause of cancer deaths in the United States. https://t.co/qrwud4Idnh
Our two countries have had many ups and downs. We must work together to repair our relationship and to achieve our common goal of peace in the region.

Yesterday I met with Pakistani Prime Minister Imran Khan. Pakistan and America have a long-standing relationship. I represent a large population of Pakistani-Americans and have developed many friendships in the community over the years. https://t.co/IJxuspUX6T

I strongly condemn the recent attack on a Hindu swami in Queens. I will continue to stand in solidarity with the Hindu community in my district and across America. May god grant Swami Ji strength so he may fully recover.

Today we discussed what can be done to help respondents in immigration proceedings who face detention deportation and in many cases permanent expulsion from the United States with no constitutional right to government-funded legal representation.
Today I met with Hank Greenberg President of @NYSBA vocal advocates for the disenfranchised particularly our immigrant communities. https://t.co/YnwN4Lgou5
This is an increase of $17 million since I was elected to Congress. The funding will be used to build up the wetlands address issues creating by rising sea levels and more.
As Co-Chair of the Long Island Sound Caucus I was able to secure $21 million to preserve and protect the Sound through House Appropriations this year. https://t.co/RWJIDaGJwf
@AOC 👍🏼
Watch my appearance on MSNBC this morning - Immigration and the President. https://t.co/0mzexp5mS1

Yesterday morning's comments about my colleagues are wrong offensive and totally unacceptable. There is no place for this type of rhetoric anywhere in our country. We must elevate the conversation.   https://t.co/aodAR7WfoU

People should not have to live in constant fear nor should they be used as pawns. Our nation is founded on the basic idea that EVERY person has rights. Know yours. Attached please see a list of what you can do if ICE comes knocking: https://t.co/ptfrCtkhnE

Later today I will be traveling to Texas to shine a light on the conditions at migrant detention centers at our southern border. Meanwhile the President is threatening to launch massive raids targeting thousands of immigrants. This is just wrong!

Since my earliest days in public service as Mayor of my hometown of Glen Cove I have championed the humanitarian rights of immigrants. I will always fight to ensure that all people are treated with human respect and dignity

We must continue to work to protect the children and families at our Southern Border. I continue to work on a comprehensive solution but we must address the humanitarian emergency now! I have co-sponsored three very important pieces of legislation: https://t.co/5gjGKREWJ4
This weekend I will be traveling to McAllen and Brownsville Texas to see and witness firsthand the conditions at the migrant detention centers.  https://t.co/lT8QA5YtU7
After so many years veterans and their families are receiving the justice and support that they deserve.

Another victory for all the Vietnam-era "Blue Water" Navy veterans! Under the Blue Water Navy Vietnam Veterans Act of 2019 which I voted in support of and the President has signed into law the VA has expanded the list of Agent Orange-related presumptive conditions. https://t.co/5yFsOa6vl9
Please see my statement below regarding today's Supreme Court decision on gerrymandering: https://t.co/F4BO5DevGp
The FAA needs to get this done and done quickly!  Read today's Newsday editorial https://t.co/bvmGQin6Kf
Make America Fair Again! Listen to my testimony from yesterday's Ways and Means hearing on reinstating the SALT deductions. I felt my testimony was strong; what do you think? https://t.co/lBD4ex6M2P

I am incredibly concerned about the conditions at border detention centers!  Last year I visited facilities in Tornillo Texas. From what I saw conditions were fine but reports of the conditions over the last few weeks are horrifying. https://t.co/PK64hhrQqp

Yesterday the Ways and Means Committee met to question US Trade Representative Robert Lighthizer on trade and the USMCA. Listen to my questioning on the need for more stringent labor enforcement provisions. https://t.co/dvX0Skf9EY

I want to hear from you!  I am going to be hosting a live Tele-Town Hall this evening from 7:30-8:30pm. Join me to talk about some of the critical issues that are important to you.  Dial (877) 229-8493 and when prompted enter pin 117061 https://t.co/bcgOtsUztz
From today's @Newsday - more on my efforts to streamline and expedite the cleanup of the Navy-Grumman plume. https://t.co/kR0laClDOr

Our 9/11 heroes answered our nation's call and should have peace of mind knowing that the 9/11 VCF will be there to help them and their families as long as they need it. This is not about whether you are a Democrat or a Republican. This is about doing the right thing. https://t.co/Jt7xmQmCb3

Today the House Judiciary Committee held a hearing to permanently authorize and fund H.R. 1327 the Never Forget the Heroes: Permanent Authorization of the Sept 11th VCF of which I am a cosponsor. #Renew911VCF
Truly sobering and humbling.  Read the article in @Newsday  https://t.co/6MHKmtoZxV
I have not even been here for 24 hours and cannot emphasize enough what a stunningly powerful experience this has been.

I also had an opportunity to meet with the future Chairman of the Joint Chiefs of Staff Army Chief of Staff Gen. Mark Milley and the National Commander of the American Legion Brett Reistad. https://t.co/kPuAyUTeaI
After this morning's ceremonies I visited the American Cemetery in Colleville-sur-Mer where I will return tomorrow to pay my respects at the graves of 21 soldiers from my district interred there.

More than 10000 people attended this morning's ceremony. To see them all rise in unison in honor of the veterans who served and sacrificed was powerful.  I will continue to share updates photos and videos of this trip over the next few days.
Arriving in Normandy by helicopter this morning 75 years after D-Day I was struck by the magnitude of this view of the beaches and cliffs at Omaha Beach. https://t.co/CHmimrN2of
Please read NEWSDAY's story on the 75th anniversary of D-Day and my observations of today's moving ceremonies. https://t.co/gPk7V0ZyNR
I am in Normandy with a bipartisan delegation commemorating the 75th anniversary of D-Day. May we never forget the service and sacrifice of our "Greatest Generation." https://t.co/IwgndHN3bR
The 30th Anniversary of the Tiananmen Square massacre in China is today. Please watch my testimony and questioning of these human rights activists. We stand with you!!  https://t.co/VJGHzogpfV

June 6 1944. We must never forget.   This week as I travel to Normandy to commemorate the 75th anniversary of D-Day I will carry with me the stories of horror and heroism of Harry Arlin Irving Goodman and John McHugh. https://t.co/4EeJ7Wy6Nf
Congratulations to the @LGBTNetworkNY  on the grand opening of your new Community Center in Hauppauge the largest suburban LGBT community center in the country. https://t.co/YmaufQ07S0
Here is my interview on News 12 Long Island's Power and Politics. https://t.co/wvPfwpD7JD
I am going to be on @News12LI Power & Politics this evening at 8pm. Tune in and let me know how I did. https://t.co/eVDB8a9Kr3

What a great evening!  Last night I was a keynote speaker at the @CityAndStateNY 2019 Long Island Power 100 event honoring some of our local movers and shakers in government business culture academia and social services. https://t.co/guAvTysN6k
This morning I spoke with students from Great Neck South High School on how they can engage civically and make a difference in their communities. Thank you for having me! https://t.co/kH8AaCUXul
I was on the radio today. Give it a listen. https://t.co/LgR0sB70Mh
Coming up at 10:00 AM E.T. I will be on @WNYC 's Morning Edition with @BrianLehrer and @RepMalinowski. Please tune in!  https://t.co/NHpl11jZMS

We will never forget.  Thank you Corporal John McHugh for your service and sacrifice to this great nation.  Here is more from @CBSNewYork  of my visit with Cpl. McHugh this morning. https://t.co/RrCZV0NJSc

This morning I was honored to meet and speak with Whitestone resident Corporal John McHugh Sr. a 95-year young Army veteran who 75 years ago landed on Omaha Beach during the Allied invasion of Normandy on D-Day. https://t.co/VOaHT4vmHs

AIPAC is a not-for-profit that promotes US - Israel relations and specifically does not make donations to political campaigns.   My support for Israel is based upon our shared values our national security interests and the history of the region.

Rep. Omar’s tweet yesterday went too far. To suggest that pro-Israel support “Is all about the Benjamins” and her follow up that she is referring to AIPAC is not only inaccurate but conjures up the worst anti-Semitic stereotypes.
